column5: Our cottage is in Pike Bay, and was wondering if anyboby else is close by for an day or afternoon of fishin?  We try to get up as much as possible. I have a 16ft boat no trailer with a 9.9 so im limited to how far out i can go and how long. Thats not an issue, just wanting to expolre other spots.
Ah crap forgot to add, Come on my boat is available for you  to try my area
i have family that lives in red bay, plus my dad has a cottage there, i go up a couple weekends every summer to fish smallies in lake huron
